thread.section_title: Double Happiness Beijing Courtyard Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Welcom
thread.title_full: Welcom - Review of Double Happiness Beijing Courtyard Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Nathaniel A
title: Welcom
text:
Very nice place and uncommon hotel. Room are clean and all you need in.
Wifi a bit slow during the day. They welcome you as a it should be and take care of what you need or should need. They give you help and recommendations. Situation very good too.
Weak point is the noise when people arrive during the night otherwise very calm.
